sentences: Daniele Alexander (born December 2, 1954, in Fort Worth, Texas) is an American country music singer.
She began her career as a teenager, performing jazz initially before moving to Las Vegas, Nevada to sing in casinos.
She also charted in the Top 20 on the Billboard charts with the single "She's There", a single from her 1989 Mercury Records album First Move.
Alexander exited Mercury in 1991, and later co-wrote two songs on Mila Mason's 1997 debut
